Question & Options:
Which of the following statements are true regarding the accolades received by the film produced by Nadiadwala Grandson Entertainment?
Options:
A. A) The film was nominated for Best Film at the Filmfare Awards in 2020.
B. B) The Filmfare Awards ceremony took place on 15 February 2020.
C. C) Nadiadwala Grandson Entertainment produced the film.
D. D) The film won the Best Film award at the Filmfare Awards in 2020.
Correct Answer: A) The film was nominated for Best Film at the Filmfare Awards in 2020., B) The Filmfare Awards ceremony took place on 15 February 2020., C) Nadiadwala Grandson Entertainment produced the film.

Question & Options:
Which of the following statements are true regarding the Filmfare Awards and Nitesh Tiwari's role?
Options:
A. A) Nitesh Tiwari was nominated for Best Director at the Filmfare Awards in 2020.
B. B) The Filmfare Awards ceremony took place on 15 February 2020.
C. C) The Filmfare Awards are categorized under various award types.
D. D) Nitesh Tiwari directed the film that received accolades at the Filmfare Awards.
Correct Answer: A) Nitesh Tiwari was nominated for Best Director at the Filmfare Awards in 2020., B) The Filmfare Awards ceremony took place on 15 February 2020., C) The Filmfare Awards are categorized under various award types.
